Package org.academiadecodigo.bootcamp.gfx.lanterna

Class LanternaGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.academiadecodigo.bootcamp.gfx.lanterna.LanternaGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grid
    public class LanternaGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements Grid
    A Grid based on the Lanterna library This implementation DOES NOT contain keyboard support
